Instruction: Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add onion and garlic, cook until softened.
Stir in black beans, cumin, chili powder, paprika, salt, and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
For guacamole: Cut avocado in half, remove pit, and scoop out flesh into a bowl.
Add juice of one lime, diced tomato, chopped onion, cilantro, salt, and pepper to the avocado.
Mash avocado with a fork until desired consistency.
Fill taco shells with black bean mixture and top with guacamole.
